First Post

06 Jan 2015

This is my first post. I’m mostly going to be talking about programming (I like Clojure), and doing programming challenges.

I’m a software developer at Paychex in frigid Rochester, NY. I work in a whole bunch of technologies, including C, Java, and .NET. I work mostly in the back end on our money transmission and filing infrastructure.
